text.autoconfig.player-locator-plus.opti: Send exact distances to other players along with the direction. This significantly improves smoothness.
Maximum distance between players when the markers are still visible.
How precise a marker's direction is when the other player is far away. Set this to a low value to (somewhat) combat triangulating players' positions.
Number of server ticks between updates to the player locator. Decreasing this value increases network usage. Reading technical details is recommended before changing this value.
Whether the markers are shown on the client
Decrease markers' opacity when you're far from another player
Show a little up or down arrow near a marker when the difference in height is significant.
